org.kordamp.jsilhouette.javafx

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kordamp.jsilhouette.javafx.AbstractSilhouette
      • org.kordamp.jsilhouette.javafx.AbstractCenteredSilhouette
        • org.kordamp.jsilhouette.javafx.RegularPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CenteredSilhouette, Silhouette

    public class RegularPolygon
extends AbstractCenteredSilhouette

    RegularPlygon

    Defines a regular polygon shape.

    Constraints

    1. sides > 2

    Style Classes

    1. silhouette

    2. silhouette-regular-polygon

    Author:
    Andres Almiray
